# Configuration for GraphQL API

## Introduction

The `GraphqlConfig` supergraph metadata object allows you to configure the GraphQL schema generated by Hasura. This
object helps you configure the common graphql schema applicable to all subgraphs.

Specifically it allows you to configure:

1. The root type names for query, mutation and subscription operations.
2. The name for Model selection input field names (`where`, `limit`, `offset`, `args`, `order_by`)
3. The enum values for `order_by` directions and the `order_by` enum type name.

It is recommended to provide this metadata object in the supergraph since this will be made mandatory in future. Until
then if it is not provided, Hasura will generate the GraphQL API with the default values.

## Description

To create the graphql configuration, you need to define an object of `kind: GraphqlConfig` and `version: v1` in the
supergraph. The object `definition` has the following fields:

## Metadata structure

### GraphqlConfig

| Name | Type | Required | Description |
| ---- | ---- | -------- | ----------- |
| `query` | `object` | `true` |  |
| `mutation` | `object` | `true` |  |

#### QueryGraphqlConfig

| Name | Type | Required | Description |
| ---- | ---- | -------- | ----------- |
| `rootOperationTypeName` | `string` | `true` |  |
| `argumentsInput` | [`ArgumentsInputGraphqlConfig`](#argumentsinputgraphqlconfig) | `false` |  |
| `limitInput` | [`LimitInputGraphqlConfig`](#limitinputgraphqlconfig) | `false` |  |
| `offsetInput` | [`OffsetInputGraphqlConfig`](#offsetinputgraphqlconfig) | `false` |  |
| `filterInput` | [`FilterInputGraphqlConfig`](#filterinputgraphqlconfig) | `false` |  |
| `orderByInput` | [`OrderByInputGraphqlConfig`](#orderbyinputgraphqlconfig) | `false` |  |

#### ArgumentsInputGraphqlConfig

| Name | Type | Required | Description |
| ---- | ---- | -------- | ----------- |
| `fieldName` | `string` | `true` |  |

#### LimitInputGraphqlConfig

| Name | Type | Required | Description |
| ---- | ---- | -------- | ----------- |
| `fieldName` | `string` | `true` |  |

#### OffsetInputGraphqlConfig

| Name | Type | Required | Description |
| ---- | ---- | -------- | ----------- |
| `fieldName` | `string` | `true` |  |

#### FilterInputGraphqlConfig

| Name | Type | Required | Description |
| ---- | ---- | -------- | ----------- |
| `fieldName` | `string` | `true` |  |
| `operatorNames` | `object` | `true` |  |

#### FilterInputOperatorNames

| Name | Type | Required | Description |
| ---- | ---- | -------- | ----------- |
| `and` | `string` | `true` |  |
| `or` | `string` | `true` |  |
| `not` | `string` | `true` |  |
| `isNull` | `string` | `true` |  |

#### OrderByInputGraphqlConfig

| Name | Type | Required | Description |
| ---- | ---- | -------- | ----------- |
| `fieldName` | `string` | `true` |  |
| `enumDirectionValues` | `object` | `true` |  |
| `enumTypeNames` | [`OrderByEnumTypeName`](#orderbyenumtypename) | `true` |  |

#### OrderByDirectionValues

| Name | Type | Required | Description |
| ---- | ---- | -------- | ----------- |
| `asc` | `string` | `true` |  |
| `desc` | `string` | `true` |  |

#### OrderByEnumTypeName

| Name | Type | Required | Description |
| ---- | ---- | -------- | ----------- |
| `directions` | [`OrderByDirection`](#orderbydirection) | `true` |  |
| `typeName` | `string` | `true` |  |

#### MutationGraphqlConfig

| Name | Type | Required | Description |
| ---- | ---- | -------- | ----------- |
| `rootOperationTypeName` | `string` | `true` |  |
